- "I need to recode variable values based on some conditions, such as replacing missing values, or coarsenig existing categorical variables.
Solution: [See this guide](http://dwoll.de/rexrepos/posts/recode.html).

- "I am trying to use `select` but it doesn't work." Likely solution: use `dplyr::select()`. See: [r - dplyr::select function clashes with MASS::select - Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24202120/dplyrselect-function-clashes-with-massselect).
